title: Lemon chicken with tomato, basil and mash
ingredients: ['3 large potatoes, chopped', '1 lemon', '2 (150g) chicken breast fillets', '1 small bunch fresh thyme', '2 fresh tomatoes, diced', '30ml red wine vinegar', '1 small bunch fresh basil', '1 dollop low fat sour cream', '100ml semi-skimmed milk', '1 dollop low salt butter', '1 pinch salt and pepper']
